caption.p: Proportion of quadrats with A. petiolata presence in June. Lines show predictions from a Generalised Additive Mixed Model with binomial errors for 0th, 25th, 50th, 75th and 100th quantiles of longitude. Model included random intercept effects for calendar year and nested effects for site and quadrat within site, as well as a random slope for monitoring year. Declines in the Northeast are more substantial than in areas in the Midwest.
